metadata.title: CVE-2016-3911 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: core/java/android/os/Process.java in Zygote in Android 4.x before 4.4.4,5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, 6.x before 2016-10-01, and 7.0before 2016-10-01 allows attackers to gain privileges via a craftedapplication, aka internal bug 30143607.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
